description: Several members have asked me to do a demo that discusses what the different toys feel like. This is part 1 of that demo. This is really fun to watch, and you get to see Lorelei Lee try out different violet wand attachments and describe how they feel, how painful they are, and how scary they are! This demo also shows why we keep girls tied up for wiredpussy!!!!
title: Electrical Demo Part 1: The Violet Wand
